analysis: The documents in this cluster all pertain to land management and resource allocation, specifically dealing with the modification, revocation, or establishment of reserves for various purposes such as coal, water, power sites, oil shale, and game refuges. They involve specific land descriptions, referencing meridians, townships, ranges, and sections. The documents reflect actions taken by the President to manage public lands and resources, often in response to existing legislation.
title: Adjustments to Land and Resource Reserves
